title: @Meddler  More Champion Masteries - Champion Mastery 8
body:
Hey everybody,
with Champion Mastery 6 & 7 we got a new "Hunt" or "Goal" to achieve with our main Champion/s.
Because those masteries wer based on ratings after the game, they were quite harder to get unlike the other masteries where you literally just had to play the champion over a certain amount of time.
But after this, there ist still potential for more or new masteries beeing based of ratings after the game.
As you all know, it is possible to achive an "S+" grade, so why wouldn't you base a new mastery on "Rank S+  to earn a mastery 8 Token" and have the players to collect 3 or even 4 of those tokens?

Greetings from Germany!

replies.body: We've talked about potentially extending Champion Mastery further. I'm not sure what current thinking and/or plans on that are though, my apologies, I don't work directly on or with the team that handles those sorts of systems.

I wonder if we can have different challenges for mastery 8 depending on which class your champion is

Like for tanks it could be things like damage tanked, total number of cc applied, neutral objective take downs

 Supports could have different things like wards killed, assists or damage shielded

More direct gameplay related stuff, or perhaps even totally different challenges, like play your champion in different positions or something like that to shake up the meta a bit. Or interact with all champions on the roster to name something odd

We already need to get S games to get 7 so that proves a certain mastery is needed before you can attempt mastery 8

So mastery 8 could be something entirely different then just getting S+ ratings which could then be used for mastery 9.

And mastery 10 could be some sort of series of ridiculous challenges based on the champion itself like acquiring 10k health on Sion in a soloq game & killing 10 people with your passive etc etc, something iconic and unique for each champion
How about something actually having to do with being good at the champion?
afk farming doesn't reflect champion mastery? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
